mixed-citation.article-title: Review of the species of Stenothemus from Southeast China (Coleoptera, Cantharidae)

tp:treatment-sec.p:
CHINA –
Fujian
• 1 ♂ ; Shaowu , Tachuland ;
14 May 1945
; collector unknown; NHMB
. –
Zhejiang
• 2 ♂♂ , 1 ♀ ; Qingyuan , Baishanzu , Chameiyu ;
1300 m a.s.l.
;

•
1 ♂ ; same locality as for preceding;
800 m a.s.l.
;

•
1 ♂ ; Longquan , Fengyangshan ;
1800 m a.s.l.

.
This species was described only based on the male, and the female is here recorded for the first time.
